author: Source: Berkshire Eagle
title: Dell buying EMC in a transaction valued at about $67 billion - Berkshire Eagle
text:
This file photo shows the EMC offices in Santa Clara, California. Dell is buying data storage company EMC in a deal valued at approximately 67 billion, the companies announced on Monday.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Berkshire Eagle.
